item.description: thanks for the mention. web is getting hot in israel indeed...

item.title: By: Justin Mason
item.dc:creator: Justin Mason
item.description: It's worth noting that Israeli startups -- particularly in the computer security space -- tend to be well off, since they have a very well-funded defense sector. However, neutral Ireland, not so much ;)
item.content:encoded: It’s worth noting that Israeli startups — particularly in the computer security space — tend to be well off, since they have a very well-funded defense sector. However, neutral Ireland, not so much
